code: import React from"react";import"./styles.css";import{Line,Pie}from"@ant-design/charts";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChartComponent(_ref){let{sortedTransactions}=_ref;const incomeData=sortedTransactions.filter(transaction=>transaction.type==="income").map(item=>({date:item.date,amount:item.amount}));const spendingData=sortedTransactions.filter(transaction=>transaction.type==="expense");const finalSpendings=spendingData.reduce((acc,obj)=>{const key=obj.tag;if(!acc[key]){acc[key]={tag:key,amount:obj.amount};}else{acc[key].amount+=obj.amount;}return acc;},{});const newSpendings=Object.values(finalSpendings);const config={data:incomeData,width:500,autoFit:true,xField:"date",yField:"amount",point:{size:3,shape:"circle"}};const spendingConfig={data:newSpendings,width:500,autoFit:true,angleField:"amount",colorField:"tag",color:["#FF5733","#33FF57","#3357FF","#FF33A8","#FFC300"]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"charts-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"linechart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginTop:'1rem',marginLeft:"1rem"},children:"Your Analytics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{...config})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"piechart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:"Your Spendings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{...spendingConfig})]})]});}export default ChartComponent;
